input.sentences: on my way to work taking this long commute everyday .
this back road way should take away some of congested traffic .
this way is leading past all these abandon buildings .
coming this way sure does seems a lot less stressful .
looking out from a window at my workplace now that i have gotten here .
output.sentences: A car takes the same route everyday on its commute.
As always, the traffic on the road was congested as his middle aged gut.
He drove past the same old grey buildings, seen day after day, all a blur past his rearview mirror.
His car drove over a bridge and he felt the stressful weight that bridge must be feeling holding the weight of all of the fellow drivers.
He neared his workplace and gazed out the window pulling his car in park, taking a deep breath preparing himself for the continued monotony.
